    A class for loading images from a source folder.

        public static void setPath(java.lang.String path)

      • loadBMP

        public static Sprite loadBMP(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an image from the specified path to a Sprite. The extension is automatically appended.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the image to load

      • loadFramesFromGIF

        public static Sprite[] loadFramesFromGIF(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an animated GIF from the specified path, and extracts its frames into an array of Sprites.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the image to load
        Returns:
        An array of Sprites for each GIF frame
